posts.post_content:
I figured I would put up a post to see if anyone is looking to sell a T206 Bill Dahlen (Brooklyn).  I'm willing to entertain discussion about a card in any grade and have a slight preference towards a graded version (SGC or PSA), but would entertain a raw card as well with good scans.  

If you have one to offer, send me a PM and I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
